zettwerk.mobile
===============

Apply jquery.mobile based theme to plone.


Usage
=====

Add zettwerk.mobile to your buildout and install it via quickinstaller. It also installs zettwerk.mobiletheming for url based theme switching. Go to the plone control panel and set up a hostname, under which the theme should be applied. Also choose zettwerk.mobile from the list of existing themes as mobile theme.
